abstract: Equity markets across Asia rose sharply in early trading Wednesday, buoyed by positive news from Citigroup and by one of the biggest one-day gains in the Dow Jones industrial average in more than 60 years.
lead_paragraph: Equity markets across Asia rose sharply in early trading Wednesday, buoyed by positive news from Citigroup and by one of the biggest one-day gains in the Dow Jones industrial average in more than 60 years.

headline.main: Asian Markets Rise in Early Trading

abstract: Dow Chemical may not have to sell the company silver to pay for Rohm & Haas after all.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical may not have to sell the company silver to pay for Rohm & Haas after all.

headline.main: Dow Tries to Revive Venture With Kuwait
